item.title: Discord Server Designing 101 - Basics
item.description: This is a reuploaded guide, I do not own anything written here. The original github guide can be found here A basic server template is available here Creating and Growing a Discord Server Introduction Hello! I’m jagrosh#4824! I’m writing this guide to try to help new server owners set up and grow their servers, which is a commonly-requested topic. It’s very easy to go about this the wrong way, so it’s best to be prepared and make smart decisions so that your community can flourish!
